modules.name: Data Fundamentals
modules.description: This module introduces core data concepts, including data types, structures, and analysis techniques. It covers essential tools for data manipulation and exploration.
aims: Define and differentiate various data types.
Apply basic data manipulation techniques using SQL.
Interpret and visualize data using common charting tools.
Understand fundamental statistical concepts for data analysis.

modules.name: Python for Data Science
modules.description: This module focuses on Python programming fundamentals relevant to data science. Learners will gain proficiency in data structures, control flow, and essential libraries for data manipulation and visualization.
aims: Write basic Python scripts for data processing.
Utilize Python libraries like Pandas for data manipulation.
Create informative visualizations with Matplotlib and Seaborn.
Understand object-oriented programming concepts in Python.

modules.name: Data Wrangling and Exploration
modules.description: This module delves into the process of preparing data for analysis. Learners will master techniques for cleaning, transforming, and exploring data to uncover patterns and insights.
aims: Cleanse and prepare messy real-world datasets.
Transform data into suitable formats for analysis.
Apply data aggregation and filtering techniques.
Identify and handle missing data effectively.

modules.name: Machine Learning Foundations
modules.description: This module introduces the fundamental concepts and algorithms of machine learning. Learners will explore supervised and unsupervised learning techniques, model evaluation, and practical applications.
aims: Differentiate between supervised and unsupervised learning.
Understand key machine learning algorithms (e.g., linear regression, decision trees).
Evaluate the performance of machine learning models.
Apply basic machine learning techniques to real-world datasets.

modules.name: Data Visualization and Storytelling
modules.description: This module focuses on effectively communicating data insights through compelling visualizations and narratives. Learners will explore techniques for designing impactful dashboards and presenting data-driven stories.
aims: Create informative and visually appealing data visualizations.
Tell compelling data stories that engage audiences.
Design effective dashboards for data monitoring and insights.
Communicate complex data insights clearly and concisely.

modules.name: Database Management Principles
modules.description: This module provides a foundational understanding of database systems. Learners will explore relational database concepts, SQL querying, and data modeling techniques.
aims: Understand the principles of relational database design.
Write SQL queries to retrieve, manipulate, and analyze data.
Implement basic data modeling techniques.
Explore different database management systems.

modules.name: Cloud Computing for Data Science
modules.description: This module introduces cloud computing platforms and their applications in data science. Learners will explore services for data storage, processing, and machine learning.
aims: Understand the basics of cloud computing infrastructure.
Utilize cloud services for data storage and retrieval (e.g., S3, Azure Blob Storage).
Explore cloud-based machine learning platforms (e.g., AWS SageMaker, Azure ML).
Implement cost-effective data processing solutions in the cloud.
